title: Manage Water Quality Monitoring
description: An environmental officer checks the latest water quality monitoring data to ensure the mine is compliant with its discharge permit.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest water quality sample results from the downstream monitoring point.
tasks.expected_outcome: The latest lab analysis for pH, suspended solids, and heavy metals is retrieved.

tasks.description: Compare the results against the compliance limits set in the mine's environmental permit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The comparison shows all parameters are well within the allowed limits.

tasks.description: Generate the monthly water quality report for submission to the environmental regulatory agency.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant report is automatically generated and ready for submission.
